[2020-08-25T17_15_36_969Z-debug.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5126581/2020-08-25T17_15_36_969Z-debug.log)
Unable to install npm on its own or as a dependency.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install npm
...
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j12'

1 error found in build log:
     188    npm ERR!
     189    npm ERR! Failed at the npm-cli-docs@0.1.0 build:static script.
     190    npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.
     191    
     192    npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
     193    npm ERR!     /Users/butler59/.npm/_logs/2020-08-25T21_08_57_981Z-debug.log
  >> 194    make: *** [htmldocs] Error 1
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.15.4-698-8b5fcbfaf
* **Python:** 3.7.8
* **Platform:** darwin-catalina-skylake


### Additional information

The log files show

```console
Error: self signed certificate in certificate chain
```
title: Installation issue: npm
